job-1.title: Senior Web Designer
job-1.description: Responsible for the design and development of banners ads, e-mail campaigns, game sites, landing pages and branding. Accelerated design team's production process by over 500% with custom built templates, allowing a team of three to produce in one day what it previously took a team of seven one week.

job-2.title: Senior Web Designer/Developer
job-2.description: Served as the only hybrid designer/developer in the team, responsible for creating animated banner ads, email campaigns, responsive landing pages. Pioneered multi-team templates that reduced project design and front-end implementation time from ten to three days, increasing production speed by over 300%.

job-3.title: UI Developer
job-3.description: Lead designers with establishing processes and communication practices across teams and clients during every phase of the project to ensure smooth and efficient implementation. Collaborated on company platform's web tools to enhance the client's website builder to work more efficiently on mobile devices.

job-4.title: Senior UI Developer
job-4.description: Developing and maintaining several marketing websites for WWDC and product launch events. Implementing internal web tools that accelerate the production process between dev and design teams. Initiated the development of a site map generator for the design team that substantially reduces work time from weeks to a couple of minutes.
